featured.text: Moderate fires will clear the ground of competing plant life, and the rising heat dries and opens the ripe cones of the redwood, releasing many thousands of seeds onto the ground below.

definition.en_def: To strive against others to achieve a goal or win.
definition.example: Many athletes compete for a chance to win a gold medal.
